name: Whipper - Idle RPG
description:
This game is Idle RPG.
To you who are busy.

[How to play]
- Let your adventurer explore a dungeon.
- You just only need wait for the result.

[Hint of the game]
- Every time you clear a dungeon, the adventurer's level will revert to 1!
- Therefore, to conquer difficult dungeons, it is essential to upgrade your equipment!
- If you proceed to upgrade some of the items...


If you have any comments or suggestions for this app, I would appreciate it if you could send me an email or comment on twitter.

The in-game text is machine translated (DeepL).
If you find any errors in the translation, or if you would like to help with the translation, please contact us via email or Twitter DM.
